official_title: A joint resolution to provide that certain regulations issued by the Secretary of Transportation relating to highway routing of radioactive materials shall not be effective.

summary.text: Directs that specified regulations issued by the Secretary of Transportation relating to highway routing of radioactive materials shall have no effect.
